pkgmetadata.longdescription: # LazA CLI tool to configure and run parameterized actions against targets.## InstallationLaz currently requires Python 3.8+.```shellpip3 install --user laz```You can check your installation by running:```shelllaz version```## Documentation[https://joshwycuff.github.io/py-laz/](https://joshwycuff.github.io/py-laz/)## Github[https://github.com/joshwycuff/py-laz](https://github.com/joshwycuff/py-laz)
